SEARCH
Package entity

Class Internship

Object
Internship
public class Internship extends Object
Entity class for an internship opportunity.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Internship.InternshipLevel
    Represents the difficulty level of an internship (BASIC, INTERMEDIATE, ADVANCED).
    static enum 
    Internship.InternshipStatus
    Represents the various states of an internship (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, FULL, CLOSED).

      description - Description.
      level - Level.

      closeDate - Close date.

      companyRepID - Rep's ID.
      numberOfSlots - Total slots.
